summary: This is a memorandum from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General documenting a voluntary interview with a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in August 2019. The interview was part of an official OIG investigation into Epstein's death and includes references to several attached documents related to his incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; he died while housed at MCC New York in August 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: A BOP Lieutenant at MCC New York who was interviewed by OIG agents regarding the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant alongside the Special Agent.

connections.description: The Lieutenant was a BOP official at the facility where Epstein was housed as an inmate prior to his death.
The OIG Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
The OIG Senior Special Agent participated in interviewing the BOP Lieutenant.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: DOJ OIG Special Agents conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein's Death at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein, BOP inmate, died while housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Epstein Housed at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York in July and August 2019 prior to his death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General was investigating the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 76318-054).
A BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York was interviewed on September 23, 2021, as part of this official investigation.
Epstein was housed at MCC New York in July and August 2019 prior to his death.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, and several operational documents from August 2019 were attached to the report.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum and states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions.
